title: Occurrence, behavior, and ecotoxicity of quantum dots in aquatic environments

Abstract: Quantum Dots (QDs), as a new type of nanomaterial, are widely used in the biomedical, electronic, and energy fields. Due to their special physicochemical properties and composition, the harmful...
